topic.title: HPE Helion Development Platform 2.0: ALS Command Reference: Services

ul.li: helion marketplace: List the supported service plans of the target for the current or specified space.
helion purge-service-offerings: Purge all offerings of the service type from the system. Removes ALL offerings. Use with caution.
helion service: Show information about the named service.
helion services: List the supported and provisioned services of the target.

section.title: Syntax
section.p: For more information, use the helion help or helion help [command] commands.

section.title: helion marketplace
section.p: List the supported service plans of the target, for the current or specified space.

row.entry: --json
Print raw json as output, not human-formatted data.
--organization, -o
The once-off organization to use for the current operation.
--space
The once-off space to use for the current operation, specified by name. Cannot be used together with --space-guid.
--space-guid
The once-off space to use for the current operation, specified by guid. Cannot be used together with --space.
--target
The once-off target to use for the current operation.
--token
The once-off authentication token to use for the current operation.
--token-file
Path to an existing and readable file containing the targets and authorization tokens.

section.title: helion purge-service-offerings <service>
section.p: Purge all offerings of the service type from the system. Do this only for services that have been "orphaned" because their brokers have already been killed.

row.entry: --target
The once-off target to use for the current operation.
--token
The once-off authentication token to use for the current operation.
--token-file
Path to an existing and readable file containing the targets and authorization tokens.
--version
The service version. Use this to disambiguate between multiple versions of the same vendor/type.
